sen.j: 藤原 枝良（ふじわら の えだよし、承和 (日本)12年（845年） - 延喜17年5月27日 (旧暦)（917年6月19日））は平安時代前期の廷臣。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Edayoshi (845-June 19, 917) was a retainer of Imperial Court in the first half of the Heian period.

sen.j: 従四位上、参議、修理大夫。
sen.e: His court rank was Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade), Sangi (councilor), Shuri no daibu (Master of the Office of Palace Repairs).

sen.e: He was from the Ceremonial House of the Fujiwara clan, and was the eighth son of Uhyoe no kami (Captain of the Right Division of Middle Palace Guards), FUJIWARA no Harutsu.

sen.j: 以後、中務少輔や民部大輔、太皇太后亮、左少弁などの職を歴任し、昌泰2年（899年）に讃岐国守となる。
sen.e: Thereafter, he successively held positions such as Nakatsukasa no Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs), Minbu taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of Popular Affairs), Taikotaigogu no suke (an assistant secretary of the Grand Empress Dowager's office), Sashoben (third-ranked officer of the left), and assumed the post as Sanuki no kuni no kami (Provincial Governor of Sanuki) in 899.
